SiteCanyon offer high speed cloud hosting for websites of all sizes. Our goal is to provide fast, secure, reliable and affordable hosting environment that allows you to take your business to the next level.

With our 30 Day Money Back Guarantee you can't go wrong.

Why choose SiteCanyon for your Shared Web Hosting?
  • Blazing Fast Site Load Time
  • LiteSpeed Web Server (10 times faster than Apache)
  • MariaDB (compatible with mySQL scripts, but much faster)
  • Pure Solid State Drive Raid 10 Storage
  • 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
  • 24/7/365 Expert Support
  • Free Cloudflare w/Railgun™
  • Free SSL
  • Free Daily Backups
  • Free Data Migration
  • Free Site Transfer by our Experts
  • CloudLinux OS ensure your website is always running at maximum speed
  • cPanel with Softaculous Auto Installer (WordPress, Drupal, Joomla, Magento +446 more!)

Payment Methods: PayPal, Credit Card, Debit Card, Paytm, UPI
